actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to require that each State hold a Presidential primary election on the first Tuesday after the first Monday in May of each Presidential election year.
short_title: National Presidential Primary Elections Act of 1987

summary.text: National Presidential Primary Elections Act of 1987 - Requires each State to conduct a presidential primary election on the first Tuesday after the first Monday in May of each presidential election year.

titles.title: National Presidential Primary Elections Act of 1987
A bill to require that each State hold a Presidential primary election on the first Tuesday after the first Monday in May of each Presidential election year.
